loc-1764177150470.name: The Shattered Realms
loc-1764177150470.description: A grim and eerie tavern nestled in the ruins of an ancient kingdom. Overgrown with shadowed realms and haunted by dark sorcery, it serves as a gathering place for those who seek to unravel the mysteries of forgotten kingdoms and heed a grim prophecy.

features.name: The Fading Map
features.description: An ancient map etched into a stone wall, showing paths to shadowed realms and lost treasures. It is said that only those who can interpret its language will find true guidance.

features.name: The Prophecy Pool
features.description: A pool of dark water in the center of the tavern where patrons gather to peer into the depths, seeking visions of what lies ahead. Some claim to see glimpses of a grim future that must be altered.

quests.title: Seek the Fading Map
quests.description: The ancient map etched into a stone wall in The Shattered Realms tavern holds secrets to shadowed realms and lost treasures. Only those who can interpret its language will find true guidance.

objectives.description: Interpret the ancient map's symbols and decipher its hidden paths to shadowed realms.

quests.title: Seek the Prophecy Pool's Secrets
quests.description: The pool of dark water in The Shattered Realms tavern holds visions of a grim future that must be altered. Seek to understand what these visions mean and how they can guide your path.

objectives.description: Peer into the depths of the Prophecy Pool and decipher the visions it shows, seeking guidance for your journey through shadowed realms.

currentScene.name: Whispers in the Ruins
currentScene.description: As you step into The Shattered Realms, the air is thick with the scent of decay and sorrow. The once-grand hall now lies in ruin, with crumbling stones and twisted metal scattered about. A single flickering candle casts eerie shadows on the walls, while a group of shadowy figures huddles around an old table, deep in conversation.
